item.title: Nginx getting started guide.
item.description: Introduction Nginx is a lightweight HTTP server that uses an event-driven, asynchronous, non-blocking processing framework, which gives it excellent IO performance and is often used for server-side reverse proxying and load balancing. Quick Start Install nginx sudo apt-get install nginx Uninstall nginx sudo apt-get uninstall nginx Start nginx nginx Stop nginx nginx -s stop Hot restart nginx nginx -s reload install in CentOS Install compilation tools and library files yum -y install make zlib zlib-devel gcc-c++ libtool openssl openssl-devel Install Download PCRE PCRE is used to enable Nginx to support Rewrite.
